original: PEHRSSON, Karl Gustaf, Fabrikör, Trön-ninge, f Trönninge 11/4 92 av fabr H P o Anna Eriksson, gm Ellen Paulsson. Inneh maltfabrik fr 20 samt Fabriken Vimi (ya-cuumtorkade grönsaker) fr 35. V. ordf i Södra Sv Mälteriers Frn. ordf i kommunalflm sed. 31.
translated: PEHRSSON, Karl Gustaf, Manufacturer, Trönninge, b. Trönninge 11/4 92, son of fabricator H.P. and Anna Eriksson, married to Ellen Paulsson. Owned a flour mill factory since 1920 and the Vimi factory (vacuum-dried vegetables) since 1935. Vice chairman of the Southern Sweden Malt Industries Association. Chairman of the local film committee since 1931.

structured.description: Owned a flour mill factory since 1920 and the Vimi factory (vacuum-dried vegetables) since 1935. Vice chairman of the Southern Sweden Malt Industries Association. Chairman of the local film committee since 1931.
